str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From sun and erchomai; to convene, depart in company with, associate with, or, cohabit.
Here, in this place. From a prolonged form of en; properly, within, i.e. here, hither.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Postponement, delay, putting off. From anaballomai; a putting off.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Next in order, the next day, the following day, at the period immediately following. From echo; successive.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Another form for kathezomai; to seat down, i.e. Set; intransitively, to sit; figuratively, to settle.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of basis; a step, i.e. Foot-breath; by implication, a rostrum, i.e. A tribunal.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To command, order, direct, bid. From a primary kello; 'hail'; to incite by word, i.e. Order.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
A primary verb; properly, to lead; by implication, to bring, drive, go, pass, or induce.
